name: Flattened (Ramona Neill)
description:
This Is A Document

Point and click around the environments and find cassette tapes. These tapes act as documents of my experiences as a trans women. Left click to interact with objects and ESC to quit the game. Sound on!

CW: Transphobia

This game was made as my final project for SCMC 3212W Documentary Cinema: History and Politics

Flattened Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/flat-theme
